entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.5°C

Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
